name: 章裕民
objective: 選習本課程應具有普化及一般有機化學知識，此課程主要講授環境上（尤其是應用在工程上）有關的有機化學專業知識，其主要內容包括：１.有機物種與特性２.有機物之基本化學反應３.有毒（害）有機物之處理原理４.環境有機物之代謝與循環機制５.環境荷爾蒙之化性６.微量有機物之採樣分析原理
schedule:
Introduction
Basic Chemistry in the Environment
Fundamentals of Organic Chemistry
Organic Chemistry in Waste Treatment
Organic Air Pollution
Special Topic on Dioxin/PCB
materials:
1.Manahan, S.E., ”Environmental Chemistry”, Lewis Publishers, London, 6th. Ed. 1995
2. Solomons , T. W., “Organic Chemistry,” John Wiley ,New York, 1992.
3. Streitwieser, A., “Introduction of Organic Chemistry,” Maxwell Macmillan International , New York, 1992.
